action.description: The committee on JHA recommend that the measure be PASSED, UNAMENDED. The votes were as follows: 7 Ayes: Representative(s) Tarnas, Poepoe, Belatti, Hashem, Perruso, Takayama, Todd; Ayes with reservations: none;  Noes: none; and 4 Excused: Representative(s) Cochran, Kahaloa, Garcia, Shimizu.
